channel.title: How could I add a teleporting scroll?
channel.description: I want to add a scroll that lets you choose the coordinates that you want to teleport to. How could I do something like that? I'm not really a java noob, so you don't have to give me code. Just give me a nudge in the right direction. Thanks!

item.title: How could I add a teleporting scroll?

item.description:

from rs2 i take no credit.

item.title: How could I add a teleporting scroll?
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:6, topic:389272”]A better idea is to kinda like rs2 where u have teleport “tabs” maybe you can use clay and use runes on x item and you can use a tab to teleport to a city (so if you want varrock it will be soft clay + varrock runes = varrock tab)

This could come in handy with like pking… and just general skilling etc.[/quote]
I like this idea!

Read full topic
item.source: How could I add a teleporting scroll?

A better idea is to kinda like rs2 where u have teleport “tabs” maybe you can use clay and use runes on x item and you can use a tab to teleport to a city (so if you want varrock it will be soft clay + varrock runes = varrock tab)

item.source: How could I add a teleporting scroll?

item.title: How could I add a teleporting scroll?
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:1, topic:389364”][quote author=imthenull link=topic=485191.msg3555016#msg3555016 date=1301811526]
Make a user input box that asks for coordinates, then send those to the server, server validates it, then teleports them there?
[/quote]
That’s lame, if you’re going to do it then do it properly and allow them to click a map.[/quote]

Do you really think he could do that? (not to talk shit, but I doubt you couldnt if you cant even think of a simple way to do a teleport spell) Kryptix, why even post that? And how is that doing it “properly”? Who set the standard of teleporting manually? Lmao at u.

Read full topic
item.source: How could I add a teleporting scroll?

item.title: How could I add a teleporting scroll?

item.description:

Thanks guys. I guess this is more complicated than I thought, so I’m thinking of just letting everyone use the ::teleport command.
